text: Jon Sonju (born December 26, 1975) is a former member of the Montana Senate. He is a Republican from Senate District 4, representing Kalispell, Montana, elected in 2011. He served as a State Senator until 2015. He previously served in the Montana House of Representatives from 2005 to 2010. == See also == * Montana House of Representatives District 7 ==References== ==External links== *Jon Sonju at Ballotpedia *Project Vote Smart – Jon Sonju (MT) profile *Our Campaigns – Jon Sonju (MT) profile |- |- Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:Members of the Montana House of Representatives Category:Montana Republicans Category:Montana state senators Category:People from Kalispell, Montana Category:Montana State University Billings alumni Category:21st-century American politicians
title: Jon Sonju
